<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/2.0/people/thirdparty/linkaccount"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Links a third-party account specified in the request to the user profile.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"serializedProfile":{"type":"string","description":"The third-party profile in the serialized format.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The request parameters for linking accounts.","title":"LinkAccountRequestDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
